entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 29.
